sources.title: 1937 Frau Sixta ( Ilse Werner, Gustav Fröhlich, Beppo Brem, Josef Eichheim, Gustav Waldau)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1937. Frau Sixta.  U.a mit Ilse Werner und Gustav Fröhlich

metadata.Plot: Frau Sixta (Franziska Kinz) lives in the Austrian alps, near to the italian border and is head of a post station. After her man died she also has to take care of the farm. One day a stranger arrives with the stagecoach. Markus (Gustav Fröhlich) is a retired major, who wants to start a new life in Italy. Frau Sixta persuades him to stay and manage the farm and they begin having an affair. After some time, Frau Sixtas daughter Otti (Ilse Werner) comes home from boarding school and soon she and Markus fell in love with each other. Heavy-heartedly Frau Sixta gets Markus and Otti in a coach and let them leave for Italy.
metadata.Writer: Anton Kutter, Max Mell, Ernst Zahn
metadata.Actors: Gustav Fröhlich, Franziska Kinz, Ilse Werner
